name: nShift - Transsmart with ShipIT 365
brief: Book your transport orders at UPS, FedEx, DHL and 1000+ other carriers, with one click with nShift - Transsmart.
description: Integrate nShift - Transsmart into Business Central with ShipIT 365. ShipIT 365 is the easiest way to manage all your (inter)national transport orders directly from within Dynamics 365 Business Central. ShipIT 365 is completely integrated with Business Central and is connected to the nShift - Transsmart platform with 1000+ carriers worldwide e.g. DHL, FedEx, UPS, Royal Mail, PostNL, bpost, and DPD. Simply select how to ship; book and print a transport label with one single click.
